itemDesc: An optical tool used to observe distant areas and spot enemy positions.
Protective equipment that prevents inhalation of toxic gas when fitted with a filter.
A replaceable filter used with a gas mask to provide clean air in toxic environments.
A portable communication device used to establish battlefield intelligence links.
A handheld radio used to receive intelligence updates and battlefield information.
A backpack-mounted radio that extends intelligence range and provides continuous battlefield updates.
A lightweight rucksack designed to increase carrying capacity while maintaining mobility for frontline infantry.
